isis.stitle: ANTILOCK BRAKES/TRACTION CONTROL: BENDIX - PRINCIPLES, OPERATION AND SERVICE - ADJUSTMENT

svcsubsecinfo.para: The only adjustment on the ABS system is to the sensors. When re-installing the hubs to the front axle (less the brake drums), adjust the wheel bearings.

Refer to GROUP 02 - FRONT AXLES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for bearing adjustment information. Install the sensors one per each side. Install the brake drums after the inspection is complete. Refer to GROUP 14 - REAR AXLES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for rear brake drum installation information.
